name: Computotal
description: Simple Hello World Node.js sample for AWS
author: Team3

scripts.installAll: cd ./AdminFront/ && npm i && cd ../ClientFront/ && npm i && cd ../Backend && npm i
scripts.ebReady: cd ./AdminFront/ && npm ci && cd ../ClientFront/ && npm ci && cd ../Backend && npm ci
scripts.startall: cd ./AdminFront/ && ng build && cd ./ClientFront/ && ng build && cd .. && npm start
